title.rendered: Macallan 67 Year Old Exceptional Single Cask 13

excerpt.rendered:
A rare and exceptional single cask from The Macallan. This is a 67 years old Macallan, distilled in 1950 and matured in first fill sherry American Sherry butt, it is bottled at a cask strength of 53.4% after all those years. Single casks are adored by whisky connoisseur around the world and one like this is truly exceptional. Only 336 bottles ever produced.

Bottle size : 700
Distillery : Macallan
Age : 67
Vintage : 1950
ABV : 53.40%
